TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner

summary.span: 扩展 Web 服务器控件的设计时行为。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展 类。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. 在设计图面上呈现 控件时，代码会重写 方法，以自定义 、和 属性。The code overrides the method to customize the , , and properties when the control is rendered on a design surface. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用 特性将设计器与 控件相关联。The following example shows how to use the attribute to associate the designer with the control. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#5)]

param.span: 要为其创建模板编辑框架的 。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 为 则既释放托管资源又释放非托管资源；为 则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; to release only the unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 对象占用的非托管资源并（可选）释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `true``disposing` 参数时， 方法释放此 对象引用的托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, the method releases all the resources held by the managed objects that this object references.

para.span: 方法可由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: The method can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请确保不引用已在之前对 调用的对象。

span.span: When overriding it, be sure that you do not reference objects that have been disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现此方法的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement this method, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 和 方法的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about the and methods, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取可用于设计器的缓存的模板编辑谓词。

span.span: Gets the cached template editing verbs available to the designer.

returns.span: 一个由 对象组成的数组，包含可供设计器使用的缓存的模板编辑谓词。

span.span: An array of objects consisting of the cached template editing verbs that are available to the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取设计时用于表示 控件的 HTML 标记。

span.span: Gets the HTML markup used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 设计时用于表示 控件的 HTML 标记。

span.span: The HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以更改设计图面上的 控件的外观。The following code example shows how to override the method to alter the appearance of the control on the design surface. 代码使用 `Try...Catch...Finally` 语法来执行以下操作：The code uses `Try...Catch...Finally` syntax to do the following: - `Try` 节更改数据网格控件的属性值。The `Try` section changes the values of the properties of the data grid control. - `Catch` 部分捕获任何异常并将其发送到 方法。The `Catch` section catches any exceptions and sends them to the method. - `Finally` 节将属性设置为其原始值。The `Finally` section sets the properties to their original values. 此示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#2)]

Protected Overrides Function GetErrorDesignTimeHtml (e As Exception) As String

span.span: The exception that occurred.

summary.span: 在呈现控件时遇到错误后获取设计时为指定的异常显示的 HTML 标记。

span.span: Gets the HTML markup displayed at design time for the specified exception when an error has been encountered while rendering the control.

returns.span: 设计时为指定的异常显示的 HTML 标记。

span.span: The HTML markup displayed at design time for the specified exception.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以便在发生异常时修改设计图面上的 控件的外观。The following code example shows how to override the method to modify the appearance of the control on the design surface when an exception occurs. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#3)]
